characters.LizardfolkHero: A LIZARDFOLK SORCERER - NO SWORD, this is a MAGIC USER. Green-brown SCALES covering entire body. Reptilian head with golden-amber eyes with vertical dragon-like pupils. Small horn ridges along the brow. Lean athletic build. Scales shimmer with magical draconic energy. Hands may GLOW with magical power. Confident heroic stance. Wearing simple robes, NOT armor.
characters.Spore: SPORE THE MYCONID - a small MUSHROOM CREATURE about knee-height. Pale cream-colored mushroom cap head with bioluminescent BLUE GLOWING SPOTS. Big expressive DARK EYES. Short stubby mushroom body with tiny arms. Releasing rainbow joyful spores. Hugging the hero's leg happily.
characters.Darkstorm: An enormous wolf the size of a horse, with thick silver-grey fur. Healed and loyal. Intelligent amber eyes show gratitude and devotion. Standing protectively at the hero's side.
characters.Pip: A tiny dragon (pseudodragon) about the size of a rabbit. Warm reddish-brown scales and iridescent bat-like wings. Distinctly REPTILIAN dragon head with large expressive amber eyes, small curved horns, elongated snout. Long serpentine neck and tail. Perched happily on the hero's shoulder.
characters.Starwind: A magnificent winged horse (pegasus) with a pure white coat and feathered wings spanning wide. Noble and intelligent, with silver hooves and a flowing mane. Wings spread dramatically behind the group.
